sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useContext } from "react" import styles from './CourseItem.module.css' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faEllipsisVertical, faTrashCan } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' export default function CourseItem({course}) { let itemColor = 'red' return (
{course.courseNr}
{course.name}
{course.ects} ECTS | E1A {/* */}
) }
